uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms.inputs

Class FileInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms.inputs.AbstractInput<StreamData>
      • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms.inputs.FileInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Input<StreamData>, OptionalInput
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MimeFileInput

    public class FileInput
extends AbstractInput<StreamData>
    A file upload type input. The value of this input should be a class implementing the StreamData interface. Normally the underlying DB will have a limit on the maximum upload size so add this check to the input
    Author:
    spb
